author: bsunanda
body:
1. A new AlCaReco for filtering events with 1 good muon and 1 prospective muon in the endcap beyond muon chamber coverage calibrate HE channels beyond muon chamber coverage
2. Also update AlCaIsolatedBunchFilter code to have the parameter description inside the code
title: bsunanda:Run2 alca143  A new AlCaReco from Nan for muons at high |ieta|'s
